divs: Sighting Details You know what i have reported my sightings before. And no one has ever got back to me . I need to know if what i am seeing isreal or not . I have seen many sightings since 1984 and before. And not onepreson has investigated any of my sightings . I just would like to know why .This last sighting i saw , wasnt compare to what i exp. in 1986 . If you people, only knew . what i have seen . If yo uwant to know of my recent sighting .then would someone please get back with me .
